forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain and wind. High 59F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 13C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
